name: Kondo Isami
skill: Deals 2828/3468 DMG to current target, with a very high chance of inflicting Stun.
ability: Increases own level by 17 when another member of the Shinsengumi is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the man who managed the Shinsengumi, a group of swordsmen who maintained the peace in the capital's streets. He trained rowdy young hooligans into competent swordsmen. He's not only a talented fighter, but also a faultless as a human being, which has earned him trust and respect. As a spirit he walks the streets with his fellow swordsmen to keep the peace.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" Event: Defeat LVL 40, 50, 110, 130, 160 Commodore Perry [Demonic].
◦ "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" Event: Random drops after LVL 40.
◦ "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" Get a First Half Ranking of 2501~5000.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the total Event Points by Small during the "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" event.
◦ With his ability active, his stats are 5961/6676 (MAX) or 7091/7942 (MLB)
◦ With his ability active, his skill deals 3372/4012 to current target, with a very high chance of inflicting Stun. (MAX/MLB)

main: "Don't you know how to listen to your teammates? Laugh one more time and I'll knock you out!"
skill: "Make up your mind and stick to it. Then you shall find your path."
summon: "Lend me your strength. Let's protect the streets together."
limit_break: "I shall continue to be dedicated, determined and dependable!"
